subject: Urgent: Project Deadline Tomorrow
body: We need to complete the quarterly report by tomorrow. This is critical for the board meeting. Please prioritize this above all other tasks.

subject: Meeting: Weekly Team Sync
body: Hi team, our weekly sync is scheduled for tomorrow at 10 AM. Agenda: 1. Project updates 2. Resource allocation 3. Q&A session. Please prepare your updates.

subject: Payment Confirmation: Invoice #12345
body: Your payment of $1,250.00 for Invoice #12345 has been received. Thank you for your business. Transaction ID: TXN789456.

subject: Security Alert: New Login Detected
body: We detected a new login to your account from an unrecognized device. If this was you, no action is needed. If not, please change your password immediately.

subject: 50% Off Sale - Limited Time Only!
body: Don't miss our biggest sale of the year! Everything is 50% off for the next 48 hours. Use code SAVE50 at checkout. Limited quantities available.

subject: Weekly Newsletter: Industry Updates
body: This week's top stories: 1. New regulations affecting our sector 2. Technology trends to watch 3. Expert insights on market changes. Read more on our blog.

subject: Important: Policy Update
body: Please review the updated company policies effective next month. Key changes include: remote work guidelines, expense reporting, and time-off procedures.

subject: General Inquiry
body: Hi, I have a question about your services. Could you please provide more information about your pricing and availability? Looking forward to hearing from you.

subject: Project Screenshots for Review
body: I've attached the latest screenshots of our UI design for the new project. Please review them and provide feedback by tomorrow. The images show the new dashboard layout and mobile responsive views.
